container.magisterium.arcane_table.only_: Only the first seven bookmarks will show
container.magisterium.arcane_table.name_: Name bookmarks to give sections a title
container.magisterium.arcane_table.canno: Cannot insert entries into this book
container.magisterium.spell_book.untitle: Rename the bookmark item to give the section a title.
magisterium.no_glyphs_found: No glyphs were found in range
magisterium.invalid_illusion_block: Cannot create illusion of this block
magisterium.failed_some_world_changes: Failed to make some changes to the world
magisterium.failed_all_world_changes: Failed to make any changes to the world
magisterium.page.magisterium.awaken_the_: Ignite nearby candles, campfires and other kinds of fire bearers and receptacles.

Ignis dormiens, nunc surge!

Lumen tibi impero, flammae revelete!
magisterium.page.magisterium.quench_the_: Extinguish nearby candles, campfires and other kinds of fire bearers and receptacles.

Ignis vivens, nunc quiesce!

Lumen tibi negatur, flammae extinguete!
magisterium.page.magisterium.glyphic_ign: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: arcane glyphs placed on the ground nearby
Ignite the arcane glyphs, destroying them in the process.

Sigilla ignes suscipite!

Ruptis ignibus accendite!
magisterium.page.magisterium.conflagrate: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: up to three objects infused with fire element
Unleash a burst of scorching fire, setting the entire area around the caster ablaze.
Additional items drastically increase the range of spell.

Ignis dominatur, nihil relinque in cineribus!

Materia ardeat, sit flammis consumpta!

Omnia et singula inflammare!
magisterium.page.magisterium.cold_snap.c: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: up to three objects infused with cold element
magisterium.page.magisterium.cold_snap.d: Unleash a surge of biting frost, freezing the entire area around the caster.
Additional items drastically increase the range of spell.
magisterium.page.magisterium.cold_snap.s:
Gelum rapidum, ex corde meo diffunde!

Glacies regnet, calor abscedat!

Omnia et singula glaciare!
magisterium.page.magisterium.illusory_wa: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: material that the wall is to be made of, a line of arcane glyphs on the ground
Create a wall of illusion that seems solid, but can be passed through.

Paries fallax, videaris firmus et altus!

Tangant te frustra, solidum videre sed umbra sis.

Veritas abscondita, umbra permane!
magisterium.page.magisterium.arcane_lift: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: a three by three circle of arcane glyphs
Summon a rising stream of arcane energy that lifts the creatures and objects into the air.

Arcanum levare, aethera tangamus!

Corpora et mens surgant, in altum eleventur!
magisterium.page.magisterium.dispel_magi: Does not undo the changes already done, nor can affect other schools of arcana.

Vis arcana, in nihilum redde!

Sit vacuum ubi ars fuit, nunc evanesce!
magisterium.page.magisterium.magic_barri: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: a line of arcane glyphs on the ground, nether wart, magma cream and a bottle of liquid magic
Call into existence an impenetrable wall of arcane energy, solid even to the creator.

Paries arcana, surge et tegi, te firmiter erige!

Nullus transeat, mullus frangere audeat.

Omnis vires arce, invicta permane!
magisterium.page.magisterium.enchant_can: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: blaze powder, candle, iron ingot
Imbue a candle with control over fire, allowing it to be lit and extinguished with a single touch.
Moreover, doing so affects all candles in the vicinity.

Ignis in manu, lumen in corde!

Candela, tibi impero, flammae revelete!
magisterium.page.magisterium.elements_of: Elements of Pyromancy
for the adept and the aspiring

§r𝗘𝗟𝗘𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧𝗦
§lᴏꜰ§r
𝗣𝗬𝗥𝗢𝗠𝗔𝗡𝗖𝗬
comprehensive guide to the manipulation, control and mastery of fire

by Rowena
S. Hothearth
preface
To the Seeker of Flames,
Contained herein are principles of pyromancy, spell construction, a curated compendium of spells, and a profound communion with the elemental force of fire — creator and destroyer alike.
I hope that within these pages you find not only the power to wield the flame, but the wisdom to wield it with purpose and restraint.
Handle it carelessly, and you shall kindle your own undoing.
Master it, and you may illuminate the darkest corners of the world.
Let it light up your path, warm your heart, and forge your spirit.

— R.S.H.

Year of Embers, Second Cycle
basics of spell craft
The simplest of the spells require nothing else than a precise utterance.
Many spells, however, require additional components or have conditions for the spell to work, which will be described in the following sections.
While most spells provided herein can be read directly from the book, it's recommended that one adds them to their personal grimoire.
pyromantical ingredients
The most common component in fire-related spells is a substance or object infused with elemental fire energy.

Typically, this role is fulfilled by Blaze Rod or Powder, the former providing a stronger effect. Such objects get consumed during the performance of the spell, releasing the power within to fuel the magic.
A skillful wizard can turn blaze rods into fire runes. These do not get used up by spells, but require time to recharge, and can be unwieldy at times.
arcane glyphs
Arcane glyphs are rare occurrence in pyromancy, but do appear in a few spells provided in the second chapter.
They are drawn on a solid surface with lapis lazuli, often forming a line or a circle.
The shape outlined with the glyphs shall dictate the shape or the area of the spell, thus allowing a higher degree of flexibility.
afterword
This concludes the basic introduction to the art of pyromancy.
With this, you should be able to proceed to the second chapter, where you will find a selection of spells to practice and master.
Remember, fire serves none but those who command it with tempered resolve. For fire, when untempered, consumes even its master.
magisterium.page.magisterium.lesser_arca: On the Fundamentals of Magic Beyond Elemental Bounds
A treatise on the arcane arts encompassing the principles of pure magic, its limitless applications, and practical solutions to challenges both mundane and extraordinary.

Penned in the
Year of Whispers,
Third Cycle
